title: Jimmy Lai’s 20-Year Sentence Follows Beijing’s Playbook on Dissent
summary_full: The sentence for the media mogul, along with long prison terms for his editors, shows how Hong Kong enforces Xi Jinping’s red lines with a new severity.
summary_public: The sentence for the media mogul, along with long prison terms for his editors, shows how Hong Kong enforces Xi Jinping’s red lines with a new severity.
